Class LogWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.util.RollingStore<java.lang.String>
      org.sd.cluster.job.work.LogWrapper

public class LogWrapper
extends RollingStore<java.lang.String>

Utility class for managing logging units of work and tracking rates, etc.

Author:
Spence Koehler

                                                         java.lang.String dataDirName,

Build the output filename for this work server's log.

Extenders may override. Default is to use the work server's class name and jobId through the config's output data path.
